name: monaco-typescript-project-util-sample-project
description: example on using monaco-typescript-project-util just to see how easy it is

scripts.cp-static: mkdir -p static &&  cp -r src/static/* static && mkdir -p dist/static && cp -r src/static/* dist/static
scripts.build: npm run cp-static && npm run tsc && npm run umd
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch" "npm run serve"

author: Sebastian Gurin
